formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project that the environment belongs to.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the environment containing the Kubernetes-backed cluster whose deployed services are to be discovered. The environment will be created if it does not exist.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the ElectricFlow cluster representing the Kubernetes cluster whose deployed services are to be discovered. The cluster will be created if it does not exist.

formElement.label: Kubernetes API Endpoint:
formElement.documentation: The endpoint at which Kubernetes API will be reachable. Must be a IP address or a resolvable DNS name. Applicable and required only if the ElectricFlow cluster does not already exist.

formElement.label: Service Account API Token:
formElement.documentation: Service account bearer token for a service account which has permissions to create resources in the Kubernetes cluster. Applicable and required only if the ElectricFlow cluster does not already exist.

formElement.label: Kubernetes Namespace:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Kubernetes namespace within which the deployed services should be discovered. Default to 'default' namespace.

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project in which the discovered microservices will be created.

formElement.label: Create application-scoped microservices:
formElement.documentation: Whether all the services discovered in the Kubernetes namespace should be created within one application in ElectricFlow. If checked, then the application name must be provided.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the application to create, within which the microservices will be created. Required if 'Create application-scoped microservices' is checked.
